titleStmt.title: Womens speaking justified, proved and allowed of by the Scriptures, all such as speak by the spirit and power of the Lord Jesus and how women were the first that preached the tidings of the resurrection of Jesus, and were sent by Christ's own command, before he ascended to the Father, John 20:17.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

titleStmt.title: Womens speaking justified, proved and allowed of by the Scriptures, all such as speak by the spirit and power of the Lord Jesus and how women were the first that preached the tidings of the resurrection of Jesus, and were sent by Christ's own command, before he ascended to the Father, John 20:17.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702. A touch-stone.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Fox by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
